name: Delta Land
description:
DeltaLand is made in GMS 2 , based on exploring/shooting type of games.

You have to find & kill all enemies to advance to next level. The game is only in alpha version for now. I don't have any license for " gamemaker studio 2" and beacause of that i am very limited with in-game objects.

*My goal is to reach $100 for a licensed version of GMS2 and then i'll be able to complete and improve the game.

**Since i don't have license for GMS2 this game is exported in .yyz
